svcsubproc.title: Seat Tracks (Optional)
svcsubproc.para: Seat track assemblies are located along length of the floor and spaced to accommodate changes in seat requirements and spacing. The track option is available in two variations.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. FLOOR TRACK TORQUE HEAD MOUNTING SCREWS
4. SEAT TRACK CHAIR MOUNTING INSERT LOCK CLIPS

step1.para: Variation 1: The Seat track is secured through the plywood sub-floor and secured to the steel bus floor structure assembly.

step2.para: The plywood is fastened to the floor with using an adhesive and mechanical fasteners.
The plywood sub floor is routed out to encapsulate the floor track. The floor track mounting is then drilled and screwed to the floor assembly.
The flooring material is then glued to the plywood flooring.
To remove the seat track, locate the seat assembly and remove.

Locate the track mounting screws counter sunk in the track. Loosen and remove the screws, remove the track. If the plywood floor is also to be removed, follow the procedure in the floor repair section of this manual.

step1.para: Variation 2: The seat track is mounted directly through the flooring material to the floor structure.

step2.para: Locate the track mounting screws, loosen and remove the mounting screws.
